parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the sales order instance.

parameters.name: OrderId
parameters.description: The order ID of the order for the pay-as-you-go resource. You can call the ListEffectiveOrders operation to query the order ID.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~).
